testsuite.name: Testing an API reqres.in with Serenity Screenplay Rest.

testcase.name: Register a new user
testcase.classname: Testing an API reqres.in with Serenity Screenplay Rest.

testcase.name: POST Method Test
testcase.classname: Testing an API reqres.in with Serenity Screenplay Rest.

testsuite.system-out: |-- Given that the user wants to make a request |---- User connect |-- When he makes the request, using the GET method |---- User using get method |------ user executes a GET on the resource users?page=2 |-- Then the service return the data UsersResponse{page=2, per_page=6, total=12, total_pages=2, data=[Person{id=7, email='michael.lawson@reqres.in', first_name='Michael', last_name='Lawson', avatar='https://reqres.in/img/faces/7-image.jpg'}, Person{id=8, email='lindsay.ferguson@reqres.in', first_name='Lindsay', last_name='Ferguson', avatar='https://reqres.in/img/faces/8-image.jpg'}, Person{id=9, email='tobias.funke@reqres.in', first_name='Tobias', last_name='Funke', avatar='https://reqres.in/img/faces/9-image.jpg'}, Person{id=10, email='byron.fields@reqres.in', first_name='Byron', last_name='Fields', avatar='https://reqres.in/img/faces/10-image.jpg'}, Person{id=11, email='george.edwards@reqres.in', first_name='George', last_name='Edwards', avatar='https://reqres.in/img/faces/11-image.jpg'}, Person{id=12, email='rachel.howell@reqres.in', first_name='Rachel', last_name='Howell', avatar='https://reqres.in/img/faces/12-image.jpg'}], support=Support{url='https://reqres.in/#support-heading', text='To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!'}} |---- Then Status code should be (200) |---- Then Total Registers should be (12) |---- Then Support URL should be a string containing 'reqres.in' |---- Then First name should be 'Byron' |---- Then total per pag should be (6) |---- All users on page 2 should be returned |---- status code |---- User details should be correct |-- Given that the user wants to make a request |---- User connect |-- When he wants to register a new user, using the POST method1 |---- User using post method2 |------ user executes a POST on the resource register |-- Then the user is registered correctly |---- A valid response is returned |-- Given that the user wants to make a request |---- User connect |-- When he makes the request, using the POST method2 |---- User using post method3 |------ user executes a POST on the resource register |---- User using post method3 |------ user executes a POST on the resource users |---- User using post method3 |------ user executes a POST on the resource login |-- Then a valid response is returned |---- Then Status code should be (400)
